decryptors.name: Decryptor - Attainment
decryptors.description: Greatly increases success chance and runs, slightly improves ME/TE

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Augmentation
decryptors.description: Massively increases runs and ME, but decreases success chance

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Optimized Attainment
decryptors.description: Highest success chance bonus, adds runs and ME, reduces TE

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Optimized Augmentation
decryptors.description: Balanced decryptor with good runs and efficiency bonuses

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Process Decryption
decryptors.description: High success chance, excellent TE bonus, good ME improvement

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Symmetry
decryptors.description: Best TE bonus, small success chance increase

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Parity
decryptors.description: Good success chance and runs, but reduces ME

decryptors.name: War Strategon
decryptors.description: Balanced efficiency improvements with moderate success bonus

decryptors.name: Occult Data
decryptors.description: Pure success chance bonus with no other effects

decryptors.name: Decryptor - Accelerant
decryptors.description: Maximum TE bonus, small success and runs increase
